description.text:
What does the book say?

  $(b;winter)-Somewhere in history this eye was taken by a witch, passing it's power on from generation to generation. The 'Witch Eye' as they call it now, is still in possession of one of the Witch families. - $()

 Hmm..a lot of witches like to hang around at the Autumn Court's Eternal Fall woods....we could check them out?
